title: Head of NBA Union, Tamika Tremaglio
itunes:title: Head of NBA Union, Tamika Tremaglio
description:
Business of Sports hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch chat with Tamika Tremaglio, executive director of the NBA Players Association. They discuss the goals and future of the NBA, the role of cryptocurrency and legalized betting in sports, and more women obtaining leadership positions within the industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
